import React,{Component} from 'react'; import './index.css' import './LoginForm.css' import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; class LoginForm extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state={email:"", password:""} } emailHandler = (event)=>{ console.log(`${event.target.value}`) this.setState({email:event.target.value}) } passwordHandler = (event)=>{ console.log(`${event.target.value}`) this.setState({password:event.target.value}) } submitHandler = ()=>{ this.props.parentcallback(this.state) } render(props){ return(
Log In
/*
*/ ) } } export default LoginForm;
